<a href="{{ "/index" | relative_url }}">Home</a> &gt; <a href="{{ "/browser-logs" | relative_url }}">@datadog/browser-logs</a> &gt; <a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger" | relative_url }}">Logger</a>

## Logger interface

Provides convenience methods for logging at each supported level. Each method accepts a message, optional context, and an optional error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Logger 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.alert" | relative_url }}">alert(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add an ALERT log (action must be taken immediately).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.critical" | relative_url }}">critical(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add a CRITICAL log (serious failure).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.debug" | relative_url }}">debug(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add a DEBUG log (developer usage).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.emerg" | relative_url }}">emerg(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add an EMERGENCY log (system is unusable).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.error" | relative_url }}">error(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add an ERROR log (runtime error).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.info" | relative_url }}">info(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add an INFO log (notable but expected).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.notice" | relative_url }}">notice(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add a NOTICE log (normal but significant).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.ok" | relative_url }}">ok(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add an OK log (success).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

<a href="{{ "/browser-logs.logger.warn" | relative_url }}">warn(message, messageContext, error)</a>


</td><td>

Add a WARN log (unexpected behaviour).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
